casebody.data:
No. 09-11016. Nilima Mehra, Petitioner v. Continental Casualty Company, et al.; and Nilima Mehra, Petitioner v. Kia Saeian, et al. 562 U.S. 1087, 131 S. Ct. 690, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9296.

178 L. Ed. 2d 520,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 859, 131 S. Ct. 131, 178 L. Ed. 2d 79, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 5930.
